title: BRIEF-Naos Small Cap Opportunities Declared Q1 Fully Franked Dividend Of 1.00 Cent Per Share
text:
BRIEF-Naos Small Cap Opportunities Declared Q1 Fully Franked Dividend Of 1.00 Cent Per Share

Stock Markets 23 minutes ago (Oct 17, 2019 10:21)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Naos Small Cap Opportunities Declared Q1 Fully Franked Dividend Of 1.00 Cent Per Share Oct 17 (Reuters) - NAOS Small Cap Opportunities Company Ltd : * NAOS SMALL CAP OPPORTUNITIES COMPANY LTD - DECLARED A FULLY FRANKED DIVIDEND OF 1.00 CENT PER SHARE FOR THREE-MONTH PERIOD ENDING 30 SEPTEMBER 2019

BRIEF-Naos Small Cap Opportunities Declared Q1 Fully Franked Dividend Of 1.00 Cent Per Share
